item.title: Let's talk about Pet Projects
item.description: Let’s talk about pet projects In many years reviewing job applications from software developers, one topic has come up as surprisingly controversial time and again: pet projects, i.e. projects that developers work on on their own time. So let’s have a look and see what the fuzz is all about. From the employers perspective First, let’s look at it from the employers perspective. A colleague of mine once succinctly put it like this: “You wouldn’t expect a slater to tile a roof in their free time, would you?
